Reveal Demos

These demos show reveal animations on the lay-out container using animate-self.
Scroll down to see containers reveal via clip-path as they enter the viewport.

↓ Scroll down to see animations ↓

Reveal Variants

reveal(circle)

Container reveals via circular clip-path. <lay-out animate-self="reveal(circle)" lg="columns(3)">

reveal(inset)

Container reveals via inset clip-path expanding from center. <lay-out animate-self="reveal(inset)" lg="columns(3)">

reveal(polygon)

Container reveals via diamond-to-rectangle polygon clip-path. <lay-out animate-self="reveal(polygon)" lg="columns(3)">

reveal(superellipse)

Container reveals with superellipse (squircle) corners via corner-shape. <lay-out animate-self="reveal(superellipse)" lg="columns(3)">

Pace

reveal(circle) pace="slow"

Wider scroll range for a gentler reveal. <lay-out animate-self="reveal(circle)" pace="slow" lg="columns(3)">

reveal(inset) pace="fast"

Narrow scroll range for a snappy reveal. <lay-out animate-self="reveal(inset)" pace="fast" lg="columns(3)">

Pace — Exit

reveal(circle) pace="exit"

Reveals on entry, reverses on exit. <lay-out animate-self="reveal(circle)" pace="exit" lg="columns(3)">

reveal(polygon) pace="slow exit-fast"

Slow entry, snappy exit. <lay-out animate-self="reveal(polygon)" pace="slow exit-fast" lg="columns(3)">

Custom Easings

reveal(circle) easing="ease-spring-3"

Spring easing on circle reveal. <lay-out animate-self="reveal(circle)" easing="ease-spring-3" lg="columns(3)">

Combined Animations

reveal(polygon) + fade-up()

Polygon reveal combined with a fade-up. <lay-out animate-self="reveal(polygon) fade-up()" lg="columns(3)">

reveal(circle) + zoom-in()

Circle reveal combined with a zoom-in. <lay-out animate-self="reveal(circle) zoom-in()" lg="columns(3)">
